data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Gifu, Japan.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gifu, Japan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Gifu to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Gifu, Japan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 11,744 believers in Gifu to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Judeo-Japanese people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Judeo-Japanese people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Judeo-Japanese people is yours.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Gifu, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 11,744 believers in Gifu against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, move the 11,744 believers in the state of Gifu to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."
